Package com.communote.server.core.mail

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MailManagement  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KenmeiJavaMailSender
    MailSender that creates MessageIdPreservingMimeMessage mime messages
    MailManagementBase
    Spring Service base class for com.communote.server.service.mail.MailManagement, provides access to all services and entities referenced by this service.
    MailManagementImpl
    The implementation of the mail management
    MailMessageHelper
    Helper class for mail messages
    MessageIdPreservingMimeMessage
    MimeMessage implementation that does not override the Message-ID header.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidRecipientMailAddressException
    Thrown when an email address of a recipient is not valid.
    MailingException
    Thrown to indicate that there was a problem while sending or trying to send an email.
    MailManagementException
    The default exception thrown for unexpected errors occurring within MailManagement.
